MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG7 postcode areas of Castle Douglas and Dalbeattie, affecting properties in Little Knox Cottage and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.46pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further repairs required to our overhead network at Craigton Farm and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:26PM on Sunday 18 October 2020.
